title: Chelsea transfer news: Thibaut Courtois’ agent is ringing Real Madrid EVERY DAY to try and sort a summer switch
text:
Thibaut Courtois is wanted by Real Madrid who could offer him a reunion with his kid 
And Okdiario journalist Eduardo Inda said: “Thibaut Courtois is the second choice for the post.

“The agent calls Real Madrid every day to to offer the player. 
“It could give them an option to sign him because his contract ends in 2018. 
“Chelsea would be willing to do business if Madrid drop their interest in taking Eden Hazard off them.” Related Stories 'IT BUGS ME' Asmir Begovic frustrated with back-up role to Thibaut Courtois at Chelsea but will fight for trophy glory DOUBLE YOUR MONEY Hugo Lloris is on Real Madrid radar in case they fail to land Thibaut Courtois Perfect hat-trick Thibaut Courtois beats Arsenal in London, jets to New York to see Knicks and then attends Super Bowl in Texas... in under 48 hours football factory Belgian minnows Genk's amazing production line includes Kevin de Bruyne, Thibaut Courtois... and now Leon Bailey No 'heated exchange' Thibaut Courtois was not involved in row with nightclub bouncers... he was just talking about 'life at Chelsea' He's a keeper Celtic turn down bid from Chelsea for keeper Craig Gordon as they search for Thibaut Courtois' back-up 
Inda insists that Manchester United stopper David De Gea – who Real have been chasing for years – is still their No1 target. 
But the Spaniard is valued at around £60million by United and has recently signed a new deal. 
That makes Courtois, 24, a more realistic option as he has just 18 months left on his contract. 
The Belgian enjoyed a superb spell in the Spanish capital with Atletico Madrid on a long-term loan from the Blues. Getty Images Antonio Conte will be desperate to keep hold of Courtois after he hit form Reuters 3 Manchester United activated a one-year extension clause in David De Gea’s contract 
However, rumours about his desire to stay in London have refused to go away since Chelsea recalled him to replace Petr Cech. 
Courtois has been in much improved form this season and Antonio Conte will be desperate to tie him down past 2018. Chelsea goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois scores an amazing free-kick in training Patrick van Aanholt shot amazingly saved by Chelsea keeper Tibo Courtois
